column5: I need to spool a lot of reels this season...  does anyone know where i can get Bulk Ice fishing Line?  Please let me know  Thanks,
I BUY THE LARGE ROLLS AT WALMART...JUST CHEAP STUFF BUT I'VE BEEN USING IT FOR YRS AND HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH BREAK-OFFS JUST MY OWN STUPIDITY. I USUALLY BYE THE 10-12 LBS STUFF.
NOT SURE ABOUT THAT LIGHT...THAT'S FIGHTING LINE
UB, just go order the TufLine Duracast from Phil (etackle) and you are good to go.  Don't get the ice spool, get the reg. spool and you will be fine.  I'm using that and nanofil this year.

I have had good success with Cabela's mono lines in 4 and 6# tests...if mono is what your looking for you can save a bundle using Cabela's Proline ...4# 3100 yards cost $9.99 and 6# 1980 yards cost $9.99  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Fishing/Fishing-Line/Monofilament%7C/pc/104793480/c/104719680/sc/104457780/Cabelas-ProLine174-Original-Line-150-Natural-Clear/739718.uts?destination=%2Fcatalog%2Fbrowse%2Ffishing-fishing-line-monofilament%2F_%2FN-1100384%2FNs-CATEGORY_SEQ_104457780%3FWTz_l%3DSBC%253BMMcat104793480%253Bcat104719680&WTz_l=SBC%3BMMcat104793480%3Bcat104719680%3Bcat104457780
EBAY.  I ordered some powerpro from a good seller in Michigan.  1000yd of 30lbs
